page.title: 03AN EDINBURGH CHILD'S DAY.
page.content: I wake up and put my school uniform on. I brush my hair.{The school {uniform is brown and pink.}I go up for breakfast. I have Alpen I put milk and sugar in it. I go to school in a car. I wait in the playground till the bell rings at 8.55. I get hard work to do. We go to watch a TV programme called Watch. I go to school dinners I like the macaroni.After lunch I go out to play. I play fairy houses. I come in and I do some more work. I have a shot on the computer. Then I go home and I watch TV. My favourite programme is The Puppy's New Adventure. I have some supper then I have a bath. I splash all the water out. I have an apple before I go to bed. I do not snore but Gaby my sister does. {My name is Louisa Soutar and I am {seven.}
